name: D. Very Suspicious
statement:
Sehr Sus is an infinite hexagonal grid as pictured below, controlled by
MennaFadali, ZerooCool and Hosssam.They love equilateral triangles and
want to create n equilateral triangles on the grid by adding some
straight lines. The triangles must all be empty from the inside (in
other words, no straight line or hexagon edge should pass through any of
the triangles).You are allowed to add straight lines parallel to the
edges of the hexagons. Given n, what is the minimum number of lines you
need to add to create at least n equilateral triangles as described?
